DOC.brief_title: Bortezomib Treating Patients With Persistent Recurrent Ovarian Epithelial Cancer Primary Peritoneal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine antitumor activity bortezomib patient persistent recurrent platinum-sensitive ovarian epithelial primary peritoneal carcinoma . II . Determine nature degree toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive bortezomib IV twice weekly 2 week . Courses repeat every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter .
